name: Google Bar - Dark Style
description: THIS STYLE IS NO LONGER BEING UPDATED ON THIS SITE. TO CONTINUE TO RECEIVE UPDATES, PLEASE INSTALL THE STYLE FROM THE GITHUB REPO. This style themes the Google Bar across multiple Google sites to a dark theme. This was developed to match the Dark theme for Gmail as well as my Google Calendar - Dark Style and Google Contacts - Dark Style, ben999_'s Google Voice - Dark Style, and DeathTBO's Dark Fusion - Google. Every item in the CSS has descriptions so you can edit it as you see fit.
